TITLE: Installing and Running Alto Bundler
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install dependencies, build the project, and run an Alto instance with specific configuration parameters such as entrypoints, private keys, and network settings.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm install
pnpm build
./alto --entrypoints "0x5ff1...2789,0x0000...a032" --executor-private-keys "..." --utility-private-key "..." --min-balance "0" --rpc-url "http://localhost:8545" --network-name "local"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building and Testing Alto
DESCRIPTION: Commands to build the project and run the test suite, with a note that Foundry must be installed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm build
pnpm test # note: foundry must be installed on the machine for this to work
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Ethereum Projects with Forge
DESCRIPTION: Uses the Forge tool to build Ethereum projects. This command compiles smart contracts and prepares the project for deployment or testing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/contracts/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ forge build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Tests with Forge
DESCRIPTION: Executes the test suite for the Ethereum project using Forge. This command runs all tests defined in the project's test files.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/contracts/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ forge test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Alto CLI Usage and Options
DESCRIPTION: Complete CLI usage instructions showing all available options for running local alto instances, including both local and fork modes, anvil options, and misc configurations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/scripts/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
Usage: ./scripts/run-local-instance.sh [OPTIONS]

Utility to quickly spawn a local alto instance linked to an anvil node.
*Must* be ran with either -l or -f flags.

Alto Options
   -l                       Local mode
   -f                       Fork mode (used for debugging)

Anvil Options
   -r <rpc-url>             RPC url to fork from
   -b <block-num>           Fork block number

Misc Options
   -t                       Launch anvil + alto in a tmux split
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Displaying Alto Command Help
DESCRIPTION: Command to view all available options for the Alto bundler.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./alto help
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Deploying Smart Contracts with Forge Script
DESCRIPTION: Deploys a smart contract using Forge's script functionality. Requires specifying the script file, RPC URL, and private key for the deployment account.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/contracts/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ forge script script/Counter.s.sol:CounterScript --rpc-url <your_rpc_url> --private-key <your_private_key>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Local Ethereum Node with Anvil
DESCRIPTION: Launches Anvil, a local Ethereum node for development and testing purposes, similar to Ganache or Hardhat Network.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/contracts/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ anvil
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Interacting with EVM using Cast
DESCRIPTION: Utilizes Cast, a command-line tool for interacting with EVM-compatible blockchains. The specific subcommand determines the action performed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/contracts/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ cast <subcommand>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Accessing Foundry Tools Help
DESCRIPTION: Displays help information for Forge, Anvil, and Cast tools, providing guidance on available commands and their usage.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/contracts/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ forge --help
$ anvil --help
$ cast --help
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Alto in Local Mode
DESCRIPTION: Bash command for deploying alto with a standard anvil instance. Deploys all 4337 related contracts.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/scripts/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
./run-local-instance.sh -l
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Alto in Forked Mode
DESCRIPTION: Bash command for deploying alto with a forked anvil instance. Requires RPC URL and fork block number parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/scripts/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./run-local-instance.sh -f -r <rpc-url> -b <fork-block>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Docker Environment for Alto Testing
DESCRIPTION: Command to launch the mock testing environment using Docker Compose
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/test/e2e/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker-compose up
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Alto Test Suite
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute the test cases using pnpm package manager
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/test/e2e/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Executing Alto E2E Tests with bundler-test-executor
DESCRIPTION: This command runs the bundler-test-executor script, specifying the Alto project's V07 configuration file. It assumes the Alto repository is already cloned and the path to it is known.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/test/spec-tests/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
./runall.sh $PATH_TO_ALTO_REPO/v07/alto.yml
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Formatting Solidity Code with Forge
DESCRIPTION: Applies automatic formatting to Solidity source files in the project using Forge's formatting tool.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/contracts/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ forge fmt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Gas Snapshots with Forge
DESCRIPTION: Generates gas usage snapshots for the smart contracts in the project, useful for optimizing gas costs and tracking changes over time.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pimlicolabs/alto/blob/main/contracts/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ forge snapshot
```
